data.actual_result: The chat flow freezes until you manually slide it down to view the latest messages.
data.expected_result: Chat auto scrolls to show latest message.
data.short_description: Chat doesn't auto scroll to latest message while typing a message, instead it says at the last message you read before typing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Use 3.5.7 android build - Go into a busy text room - open your keyboard and start typing out a sentence - wait a few minutes with or without typing
